library(tidyverse)
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL", "German")
options(encoding = "UTF-8")


# Define the URL of your Google Sheets
#sheet_url <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQ8cGfA3AW7mU3DCMsYnjUkJZsfqUL5yJpg6USPEffM4sFGeKqg4DParhUM-mBe-Wof-zXLCtMdlKRL/pub?output=csv"

# Define the UI
ui <- fluidPage(
  title = 'T1 Control Charts',
  titlePanel("Control Charts for T1"),
  withMathJax(),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("dataPlot"), # Output plot
      title = "Diagnostics", 
      h4(textOutput("diagTitle")),
      uiOutput("formula")
      )
  )
#)



# Define server logic
server <- function(input, output) {
  
  old.cu.10 <- c(75.1,75.5,75.1,75,74.6,75.0,74.5,74.5)
  old.cu.50 <- c(96.03,96.4,96.1,98,96.8,97,95.9,96.7,97,
                 96.8,96.4,96.0,97.55,97,96.8,97.5,96.9,97,96.9,97.0,
                 96.03,95.9 ,96.9,96.5 ,96.0,96.65,97.1)
  
  
  df.old <- data.frame(x = 1:length(old.cu.10),
                       y = old.cu.10)

  df.1.old <- data.frame(x = 1:length(old.cu.50),
                         y = old.cu.50)
  
  output$dataPlot <- renderPlot({
    # Read the data from Google Sheets
   # df <- data.frame(read.csv(text = gsheet2text(sheet_url)))

    df <- read.csv('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQ8cGfA3AW7mU3DCMsYnjUkJZsfqUL5yJpg6USPEffM4sFGeKqg4DParhUM-mBe-Wof-zXLCtMdlKRL/pub?output=csv')
    
    
    df[,4] <- as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", df[,4]))
    df[,5] <- as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", df[,5]))
    
    df.1 <- data.frame(x=df[,2], y = df[,5],z =df[,6]) 
    df.1 <- na.omit(df.1)
    df.1$x <- rank(as.Date(df.1$z, format="%d.%m.%Y"), ties.method = "first")
    df.1 <- rbind(df.1[,1:2], df.1.old)
    
    
    df <- data.frame(x=df[,2],y=df[,4],z =df[,6])
    df <- na.omit(df)
    df$x <- rank(as.Date(df$z, format="%d.%m.%Y"), ties.method = "first")+length(old.cu.10)
    
    df <- rbind(df[,1:2], df.old)
    
    
    
    df$type <- '10 ???re'
    df.1$type <- '50 ???re'
    
    df.tot <- rbind(df,df.1)
    df.tot <- df.tot %>%
      group_by(type) %>%
      mutate(
        median_y = median(y),
        upper_warning = median_y + 2 * mad(y)/sqrt(2),
        lower_warning = median_y - 2 * mad(y)/sqrt(2),
        upper_action = median_y + 3 * mad(y)/sqrt(2),
        lower_action = median_y - 3 * mad(y)/sqrt(2)
      ) %>%
      ungroup()
    
    # Use the preprocessed data in the plot
    p1 <- ggplot(data = df.tot, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
      geom_hline(aes(yintercept = median_y,colour = 'Median'), 
                 linetype = "dashed", lwd = 1) +
      geom_hline(aes(yintercept = upper_warning,colour = 'Warning Line'), 
                 linetype = "dashed", lwd = 1) +
      geom_hline(aes(yintercept = lower_warning,colour = 'Warning Line'),
                 linetype = "dashed", lwd = 1) +
      geom_hline(aes(yintercept = upper_action,colour = 'Action Line'), 
                 linetype = "dashed", lwd = 1) +
      geom_hline(aes(yintercept = lower_action,colour = 'Action Line'), 
                 linetype = "dashed", lwd = 1) +
      geom_point(color = "black",fill = "#73001d" , size = 3, stroke = 2, shape = 21) +
      theme_bw() +
      xlab('Group ordered by date') +
      ylab('Mass Percent Cu [%]') +
      facet_wrap(~type, scales = 'free')+
      scale_colour_manual(name='',labels = c('Median',
                                           'Warning Line', 
                                           'Action Line'),
                        values = c('#177F57','#07438B', '#73001d'))+
      theme(strip.text = element_text(size = 20))
  
    
    
    print(p1)
})

  
  
  output$formula <- renderUI({
    (withMathJax(paste0("The control charts (Harris, 5-1) are estimated using robust statistics. Instead of the mean, the median is used. Instead of the standard deviation, the mean absolute deviation (MAD) is used $$MAD = \\frac{| \\sum x_i-\\bar{x}|}{n}$$")))
  })
   
}

# Run the application 
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
